Item ID9174

A bronze crossbow is the weakest metal crossbow in the game. It requires a Ranged level of 1 to wield, and can only fire bronze bolts. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Bronze crossbows can be made through the Fletching skill at level 9; a player must first cut a wooden stock for the crossbow from logs, granting 6 Fletching experience. Then, a player must add bronze limbs to the stock with a hammer in their inventory, granting 12 experience and making an unstrung bronze crossbow. Finally, a player must string the crossbow with a crossbow string, granting 6 experience. Creating a bronze crossbow from raw materials grants 24 Fletching experience in total.

[[File:Bronze crossbow detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''bronze crossbow''' is the weakest metal [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] in the game. It requires a [[Ranged]] level of 1 to wield, and can only fire [[bronze bolts]]. It has an attack range of 7 increased to 9 with longrange.

Bronze crossbows can be made through the [[Fletching]] skill at level 9; a player must first cut a [[wooden stock]] for the crossbow from [[logs]], granting 6 Fletching [[experience]]. Then, a player must add [[bronze limbs]] to the stock with a hammer in their inventory, granting 12 experience and making an [[bronze_crossbow_(u)|unstrung bronze crossbow]]. Finally, a player must string the crossbow with a [[crossbow string]], granting 6 experience. Creating a bronze crossbow from raw materials grants 24 Fletching experience in total.
